description:
ABCiee is a bit klutzy and ditsy, but he`s full of spunk and he starts his dream job at a TV station! This is a work comedy filled with all kinds of hijinks! "I never knew it was so hard working at a TV station, ciee!" Despite having to face the unknown rules of the TV business, unique coworkers, and guest stars who have very particular quirks, ABCiee takes them head on with his positivity. Work, love, family, whatever goes!! Please watch over ABCiee as he takes on the TV business.
Source: crunchyroll

REGULAR.description:
ABCiee just started work at ABC TV. He`s supposed to lead a superstar actress to her greenroom, but he gets lost. Will they ever make it to the greenroom?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Newbie ABCiee Is Going to Do His Best, Ciee
Shinjin Abciee: Ganbaru shii
新人エビシー ガンバるシ~

REGULAR.description:
ABCiee is assigned to a project to get up-close-and-personal coverage of the female announcer, Miss Otter. But his senior warns him not to be fooled by her smile. But then ABCiee witnesses...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Aikurushii Joshi Ana: Kawauso-chan
Oh, So Cute! The Female Announcer, Miss Otter
愛くるシ~女子アナ カワウソちゃん

REGULAR.description:
ABCiee is off to deliver the scripts for today`s live broadcast. He then faces the choice of having to use the elevator or the stairs. But that`s when he gets a phone call from Crayfish...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: It`s Super Busy in the News Biz, Ciee
News Genba wa Ooisogashii
ニュース現場は おおいそがシ~

REGULAR.description:
ABCiee has to go buy some bentos for everyone. But he`s told that whatever he chooses could affect the rest of his TV career!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Nayamashii: Terebiman Jinsei no Sentaku!
Stressful, Ciee! The TV Man Makes a Life-Changing Decision!
なやまシ~ テレビマン人生の選択!

REGULAR.description:
Mr. Carp is a master of cue cards. ABCiee ends up having to do cue cards one day and it`s a lot harder than excepted! And then, something terrible happens during the live broadcast!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kanpe Master no Michi wa Kewashii!
The Path of a Cue Card Master Is Rough, Ciee!
カンペマスターの道はケワシ~!

REGULAR.description:
Ms. Sea Snail and Ms. Sweetfish can`t be on shows together for some reason, but ABCiee messes up and puts them on the same show. ABCiee tries to prevent this from happening, but...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Banned Pairings Can Be Complicated, Ciee!
Kyouen NG?! Yayakoshii
共演NG?! ややこシ~

REGULAR.description:
The comedian guest for the day refuses to leave their greenroom. What could have possibly happened? Will ABCiee be able to open up the comedian`s heart and the greenroom door?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Beware! Comedians Are Sensitive, Ciee!
Chuui! Geinin-san no Delicacy!
注意! 芸人さんのデリカシ~!

REGULAR.description:
ABCiee gets to eat lunch with his idol, Miss Otter. But for some reason, his lunch is missing all of its side dishes! That`s when ABCiee`s little sister and grandpa show up to the TV station. What could their motive be?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Please Let Me Through, Ciee! ABko vs. the Security Guard!
Tooshite Hoshii! Ebiko vs Guardman!
通してほシ~! エビコvsガードマン!

REGULAR.description:
ABCiee tries his hand at interviewing people on the go. He keeps trying to call out to random people but just keeps getting ignored, until finally, ABCiee finds a ray of hope.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Interviewing People in the City Can Be Touching, Ciee!
Kaidou Interview: Namida Gumashii!
街頭インタビュー 涙ぐまシ~!

REGULAR.description:
ABCiee ends up the AD on a reenactment shoot. But the actor they hired suddenly leaves and ABCiee ends up having to take his place. Wait... will this work out?!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Nekketsu! Saigen VTR Damashii!
Passionate! Reenactment Dramas, Ciee!
熱血! 再現VTRダマシ~!

REGULAR.description:
ABCiee goes to a certain ramen shop to try to get permission to film for a gourmet show, however the owner declines. ABCiee tries his best to figure out why he`s declining. What is the surprising answer that the great detective ABCiee uncovers?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Negotiating Location Shoots Is Difficult, Ciee!
Rokekoushoutte Chou Muzukashii!
ロケ交渉って超むつかシ~!

REGULAR.description:
ABCiee is set to do a magic trick at the wrap party for one of their shows. But the box he`s in explodes before he can escape! Is ABCiee all right? Goodbye, ABCiee!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Smiles and Tears, Ciee, at the Wrap Party!
Ureshi Kanashii Uchiage Party!
うれシ カナシ~ 打ち上げパーティー!
Abciee Shuugyou Nikki
ABCiee Working Diary
ABC修业日记
エビシー修業日記
